channel.title: Exams on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Exams on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Exams
item.description: Review slides are provided courtesy of course TA Amir Khandani, and are used with permission. EXAMS FILES **Midterm Exam ** Review slides (PDF) Sample exam (PDF) Sample solutions (PDF) Final Exam Review slides (PDF) Sample exam (PDF) Sample solutions (PDF)

item.title: MIT15_401F08_final_sol.pdf
item.description: This resource contains solutions for the final exam questions.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_final.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 10 questions related to bond maturing, annual membership, US treasury bonds, and fiber optic switches.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_midterm_sol.pdf
item.description: This resource contains solutions for the questions of the midterm exams.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_midterm.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 7 questions related to annual interest, annual percentage rate, and discount.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_review_fin.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions and answers related to bond maturing, market price, growth stocks, commercial airline, american call option, fixed income, CAPM, common stock, forwards and futures, capital budgeting, and portfolio theory.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_review_mid.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions related to compounding, APR-EAR conversion, common stocks, fixed income securities, present value, forwards and futures.
